parameters.name: dopractice
parameters.description: Whether to do a short practice round. Set from 1 to 0 to turn off for multi-session.

parameters.name: useCorsiPoints
parameters.description: Whether the block locations are identical to Corsi's (set from 1 to 0 to use random configuration.)

parameters.name: useKessels
parameters.description: Whether to use the problems normed by Kessels. Should be used in concert with  useCorsiPoint=1

parameters.name: startlength
parameters.description: Starting length to use if usekessels is 0.

parameters.name: endlength
parameters.description: End length to use if useKessels is 0.

parameters.name: timesperlength
parameters.description: Number of trials per length if useKessels is 0.

parameters.name: iti
parameters.description: Time between trials (inter-trial interval) in ms.

parameters.name: usebeep
parameters.description: Should a beep play on each stimulus. Set from 1 to 0 to turn off.
